Percoquo.text: --- has not broken down as reported

Percrepo.text: --- is reported to have broken down

Perdives.text: --- has done a good canter to-day

Perdomo.text: --- has been cast in his box

Perduim.text: --- reported to have been cast in his box

Perflo.text: Do not execute commission in London

Peritus.text: is covering money only which is going on ---

Perlonge.text: --- is disqualified by death of owner

Permano.text: Winner was disqualified, could not draw weight

Permotus.text: Winner was disqualified for carrying overweight

Pernix.text: Winner was disqualified for foul riding

Pernocto.text: Do nothing until you hear from me again

Perpendo.text: There will be a large field

Perplexe.text: There will be a small field

Perpolio.text: It is reported the field will be large

Perprimo.text: It is reported the field will be small

Persea.text: Answer if you cannot get on
